TopicTitle: Show date and time (ingame) on ALT-F9

Articles.Content:
When I'm on a complex mission (or a doomed one) I tend to use ALT-F5 (or the save menu funtion if I'm on KSC) to make sequential savegames.

When I need to reload them, sometimes I know how much time I have to go back (e.g. 12 ingame days) but I have some trouble remembering which savegame covers that time span.

Would it be possible to show the ingame date (and time?) in the selection window?
